description: This file is a BitBake recipe include file for configuring the bash shell build in a Yocto/OpenEmbedded environment. It specifies dependencies, configuration options, build steps, install steps, and package scripts for the bash shell.

methods.name: do_configure:prepend
methods.description: Prepares the configuration files before building, copying aclocal.m4 to acinclude.m4 if the latter does not exist.

methods.name: do_compile_ptest
methods.description: Compiles and runs the predefined tests for the package.

methods.name: do_install:append
methods.description: Performs post-installation steps, such as moving the bash binary to the correct directory if needed.

methods.name: do_install:append:class-target
methods.description: Performs inline edits to clean up host paths in the bashbug script.

methods.name: do_install_ptest
methods.description: Installs test files and adjusts Makefile entries for test directory installation.

methods.name: pkg_postinst:${PN}
methods.description: Post-installation script to ensure bash is listed in the system shells.

methods.name: pkg_postrm:${PN}
methods.description: Post-removal script to remove bash from the list of system shells.
